briefTitle: a Single-arm, Single-center, Open Clinical Study
officialTitle: Clinical Study on the Safety and Efficacy of GK01 Autologous Tumor-reactive T Cells (TRT) in Patients With Advanced Solid Tumors
conditions: Gastric Cancer, Esophageal Cancer, Cervical Cancer, Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer NSCLC, Triple Negative Breast Cancer TNBC
